com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.util

Class GenericContentConverter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.util.GenericContentConverter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentConverter<T>

    public class GenericContentConverter<T>
extends Object
implements ContentConverter<T>
    {link ContentConverter} implementation that handles variations in two dimensions: in target type (one converter instance created per type), and in underlying data format (which is chosen dynamically)
